gallery.description: Dive into our image gallery and experience every fascinating moment of the GuateCare creation process! From the first sketch to the final product, we invite you to explore each stage and witness the transformation of our vision into reality. Don't miss this unique and revealing visual experience!
gallery.description2: Raspberry Pi model 4 B, electronic components, sensors, and modules (extensions).
gallery.description3: Platform size: 115 cm x 35 cm x 2 cm
gallery.subdescription3: Scale size: 31 cm x 31 cm x 3.2 cm
gallery.description4: The product presentation will be packaged for display in a cardboard box.
gallery.description5: 1 Raspberry Pi, 1 TF-LUNA LiDAR distance sensor (installed), 1 HX711 module (installed), 1 weight sensor, UTP/Dupont connection cables (installed), connection board, buildable plywood structure for height/length measurements, 1 plywood structure + 1 platform for placing the baby (installed), and 1 power bank.
gallery.description6: For more accurate results, make sure to place the product on a flat surface. Take your time to make the necessary measurements and remember to keep the product out of children's reach for safety. Thank you for paying attention to these details!

mapa.title: Project Location
mapa.description: Hello everyone! We are pleased to announce that the GuateCare project is being carried out at the Hotel Jared, the current Permanent Care Center (CAP). If you wish to see the system in action, we invite you to visit this location.
mapa.description1: Don't miss the opportunity to see firsthand how this exciting project is developing! Your visit will not only allow you to see the system in operation but also experience up close the progress and improvements implemented at this important location.

donar.title: Support our cause
donar.description: Your contribution is valuable to this project. We thank you in advance. Register your details so we can contact you and provide you with assistance options.

contact.title: We are happy to help you
contact.description: Hello! If you have any questions or doubts, you can contact us through this form. We are happy to assist you.

mainhome.workdesc: Technology that saves lives: early detection of child malnutrition.
mainhome.title: What is malnutrition?
mainhome.intro: Acute malnutrition is a serious condition that occurs when the body does not receive enough essential nutrients, such as protein and calories, over a short period. This can lead to rapid health deterioration and be life-threatening, especially in young children.

details.causes: Acute malnutrition can be caused by factors such as hunger, lack of access to nutritious food, diseases that hinder nutrient absorption, or poor social and economic conditions.
details.prevention: To combat acute malnutrition, a combined effort is needed from governments, international organizations, and local communities.

acuteMalnutrition.subtitle: Types of acute malnutrition
acuteMalnutrition.description: Depending on the severity of weight loss and associated symptoms, acute malnutrition is classified into two main types: moderate acute malnutrition and severe acute malnutrition.

marasmus.title: Marasmus
marasmus.description: Characterized by extreme weight loss and muscle wasting due to a lack of calories and protein. Affected children often appear emaciated, with wrinkled skin and extremely low energy levels.

kwashiorkor.title: Kwashiorkor
kwashiorkor.description: Caused mainly by severe protein deficiency, often accompanied by edema (swelling), dry skin with scaly lesions, and discolored or brittle hair. Children may appear swollen due to edema but have weak muscles.

mixed.title: Mixed
mixed.description: A combination of marasmus and kwashiorkor, where children exhibit features of both types, including severe weight loss along with edema and multiple nutrient deficiencies.

prevention.title: Prevention of acute malnutrition
prevention.description: It is essential to prevent acute malnutrition through breastfeeding, a proper diet, and health care.

lactancia.title: Breastfeeding
lactancia.description: Exclusive breastfeeding during the first six months prevents malnutrition.

diet.title: Balanced diet
diet.description: A balanced diet with micronutrients is crucial to prevent malnutrition.

healthcare.title: Access to health services
healthcare.description: Access to adequate medical care is crucial for prevention.

impact.title: Impact of acute malnutrition
impact.description: Acute malnutrition has a significant impact on society, the economy, and humanity.

social.title: Social impact
social.description: Malnutrition contributes to social marginalization and exclusion.

economic.title: Economic impact
economic.description: Malnutrition reduces labor productivity and increases healthcare costs.

human.title: Human impact
human.description: The human consequences of malnutrition are devastating for individuals and their families.

causes.title: Causes of acute malnutrition
causes.description: Acute malnutrition results from a combination of socioeconomic, environmental, and biological factors. The main causes include poverty, conflicts, diseases, lack of access to healthcare, and maternal malnutrition.

poverty.title: Poverty
poverty.description: The lack of economic resources to acquire sufficient and nutritious food is one of the main causes of acute malnutrition. Poverty limits access to food, healthcare, and basic services, increasing children's vulnerability to malnutrition.

conflict.title: Conflicts and emergencies
conflict.description: Wars and conflicts can disrupt food production and distribution, displacing families and hindering access to essential services. Humanitarian emergencies exacerbate malnutrition, especially in affected areas.

disease.title: Diseases
disease.description: Diseases such as diarrhea, HIV/AIDS, and respiratory infections affect the body's ability to absorb nutrients. Young children are particularly vulnerable to these diseases, which worsen malnutrition and hinder recovery.

ignorance.title: Lack of education and knowledge about nutrition
ignorance.description: The lack of education on the importance of a balanced diet and proper nutrition contributes to high levels of malnutrition. Families may be unaware of how to prepare nutritious meals or the benefits of exclusive breastfeeding in the first months of life.

healthcare.title: Limited access to healthcare services
healthcare.description: Insufficient access to quality healthcare can worsen malnutrition conditions. The lack of adequate medical care, especially in rural or remote areas, prevents children from receiving the necessary treatment to prevent and address malnutrition.

maternal.title: Maternal malnutrition
maternal.description: Maternal malnutrition during pregnancy and breastfeeding directly affects children's health and development. Malnourished women are more likely to have low birth weight babies, increasing the chances of childhood malnutrition.

consequences.title: Consequences of acute malnutrition
consequences.description: Acute malnutrition negatively affects growth, the immune system, and cognitive development.

growth.title: Physical growth
growth.description: Malnourished children do not grow properly and face delays in physical development.

immunity.title: Immune system
immunity.description: Malnutrition weakens the immune system, increasing vulnerability to infections.

development.title: Cognitive development
development.description: Malnutrition affects brain development, resulting in learning difficulties.

problems.title: Let's solve the problems together
problems.description: In this space, you will find possible solutions for common problems.
problems.problem1: The Raspberry Pi won't turn on
problems.desprom1: Make sure the Raspberry Pi is properly connected, with one fixed red LED light and a blinking green LED light. You can also check that the connection cable is not damaged.
problems.problem2: The Raspberry Pi has no connectivity
problems.desprom2: If you get an error message from the measurement webpage, please ensure the Raspberry Pi is on the same network. If there is no response, use the Angry IP Scanner tool to search for the Raspberry Pi's IP with the host @raspberrysantos to connect.
problems.problem3: Issues logging in or signing up?
problems.desprom3: If you encounter errors when logging in, verify your credentials, and if needed, recover your password via your registered email. If you have an issue registering, re-enter your details or reload the webpage. If this doesn't work
problems.desprom4: Make sure you are authenticated properly, check that the data you are trying to save follows the expected format and scheme, and consult the error messages that appear in the application for specific details about the issue. If the problem persists
problems.problem5: Cannot edit or view any data
problems.desprom5: Check that the data exists in the correct location and that you're accessing the right path. Review the available error messages for specific information about the issue and ensure proper synchronization between the app and your internet connection.
problems.problem6: A cable got disconnected or damaged
problems.desprom6: If a cable connecting to the Raspberry Pi got disconnected, please refer to the manual to resolve it. If the cable is damaged, request assistance by calling (+502) 5383-2898.
problems.desprom7: If any component is physically damaged, please request assistance by calling (+502) 5383-2898 for immediate support.
problems.desprom8: If the changes aren't applying in the settings, please ensure you're authenticated. If you're authenticated, reload the webpage, and if not, request assistance to provide support.

about.title: Innovation that Transforms
about.description1: In Guatemala, a multidisciplinary team has come together with the goal of fighting child malnutrition through technology and healthcare expertise.
about.description2: Our project is based on two essential pillars: technology and health experts. This dual approach allows us to effectively intervene in the lives of young children, ensuring that each child receives the nutritional support they need to grow strong and healthy.
about.misiondesc: To fight child malnutrition in Guatemala with innovative solutions in technology and healthcare.
about.team: Meet the experts driving our vision
about.hisotydesc: A multidisciplinary team, driven by passion and dedication, works from the heart of Guatemala to transform child nutrition.
about.projectdesc: Our project combines technology and healthcare experts to provide effective nutritional support to children, ensuring their healthy growth.
about.impactdesc: Optimization of processes that allows for quick and effective interventions, improving care for children in vulnerable communities.
about.rewardsdesc: First place in the national Enactus Guatemala competition with the Enactus UVG Altiplano team.
about.futuredesc: Expansion to more communities in Guatemala and the region, committed to a healthy future for communities.

commuty.thanks: We would like to express our sincere gratitude to all the institutions, organizations, and entities that have supported this project. Their valuable support and commitment have been essential to achieving our goals and advancing this mission.

history.title: The History of the Project: GuateCare
history.description1: In the heart of Guatemala, where cultural richness and hope coexist with deep challenges, a multidisciplinary team of visionaries has come together with a common purpose: to fight child malnutrition. This team, driven by tireless passion and exemplary dedication, has designed a revolutionary project that combines the latest technology with healthcare expertise to address one of the most critical problems faced by vulnerable communities.
history.description2: Imagine a world where the fight against child malnutrition is not based solely on good intentions, but on concrete and efficient technological solutions. Our project is built on two essential pillars: technology and healthcare experts. This dual approach allows us to effectively intervene in the lives of the youngest, ensuring that every child receives the nutritional support they need to grow strong and healthy.
history.description4: Our goal is to transform the way child malnutrition is addressed. By automating measurement and data collection, we not only optimize processes but also provide communities with tools to act quickly and effectively. This innovation ensures that children receive the proper care at the right time, significantly improving their health and development prospects.
history.description5: We are proud to share that our project has been recognized nationally as one of the two standout projects presented by Enactus UVG Altiplano. This recognition, by winning first place in the national competition, validates the effectiveness and potential of our approach. As we move forward, our vision is to expand this solution to more communities, not only in Guatemala but across the region.

page.welcome: Hello. How can we help you?
page.description: We recommend visiting our manual for a better experience.
page.description1: Everything you need to know to start using the GuateCare system.
page.description2: Let's see how to create and edit the data captured by the system.
page.description3: If you have any issues with the system, we will take a few steps together to resolve it.
page.description4: If you have any questions or need personalized help, feel free to contact us.
page.description5: Institutions, organizations, and entities supporting this cause.
page.description6: We are a passionate and dedicated multidisciplinary team focused on transforming the lives of Guatemalan and global children. With cutting-edge technology and expertise in health, our commitment is to create a positive and lasting impact on children's well-being.
page.description7: In the heart of Guatemala, a passionate multidisciplinary team is revolutionizing the fight against child malnutrition with an innovative project that combines the latest technology with health expertise.
page.description8: The most memorable stories come to life through memories. Explore our image gallery and discover each exciting step of the GuateCare creation process.
page.description9: Join us and experience GuateCare like never before! Embark on this unique adventure with our team and be part of something extraordinary. Your participation will make the experience unforgettable. Don't miss out!
page.description10: Your Donation Makes a Difference. With your support, we will acquire more health equipment to reach more communities and departments in urgent need of help. Every contribution expands our reach and improves lives. Make your impact big!

manual.title: Welcome to the GuateCare Manual
manual.description: Welcome to the GuateCare system! Below, you will find a step-by-step guide designed to help any user interact with our system efficiently and securely. Please follow the steps carefully to ensure an optimal experience.
manual.step1dec: Before using the system, ensure that the Raspberry Pi's Wi-Fi is turned on and properly connected to the network, as this is essential for establishing a local connection with your desktop computer, laptop, or tablet. Verify that the control device is also on the same local network as the Raspberry Pi to ensure both can communicate properly. Additionally, check that all cables are securely connected and in good condition to prevent any interruptions in the system's functionality.
manual.step2desc: If the system is not powered on, connect the power supply or a charging bank. Wait between 2 and 4 minutes for the system to start properly and be ready for use.
manual.step3desc: If the previous steps were completed correctly, you will be able to use the system without any issues.
manual.step4desc: Log in with your previously created account or using the provided access service. This will grant you access to all system functionalities.
manual.step5desc: Once logged in, you will be directed to the Main Panel. Here, you will find the "Measurements" option, where you can interact with the TF-Luna sensor and the HX711 module connected to the weight sensor. From this section, you can perform measurements and obtain the necessary data for proper tracking.
manual.step6desc: In the left sidebar menu, you will find various sections that will allow you to navigate through the system:
manual.step7desc: In the Registration section, you will find two forms for registering both the guardian and the baby. It is important to note that the child's measurements must be taken before registering the baby.
manual.step8desc: In the Data section, you will find various actions and visualizations, including the ID, creation date, and important actions like editing, reading, re-measuring, reports, and alerting.
manual.step9desc: In this section, you will find all alerts issued from the Data section, where you can view the issuance date, priority, status, and ID. You can also find actions such as editing reports and marking as resolved. This allows real-time tracking of registered cases.
manual.step10desc: Reports reflect the processed data obtained from the provided data, showing important information for public viewing.
manual.supportdesc: If you have any questions or need further assistance, feel free to contact us. We are here to help you have the best possible experience with our system.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.description: On this website, the information captured, entered, or processed will be used exclusively for educational and health purposes. We guarantee the confidentiality and security of your data.

useOfInformation.title: Use of Information
useOfInformation.content: The information provided will be used for educational purposes and to promote health-related initiatives. It will never be shared with third parties without your consent.

securityAndConfidentiality.title: Security and Confidentiality
securityAndConfidentiality.content: We implement advanced security measures to protect your data from unauthorized access, ensuring its confidentiality at all times.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: If you have questions or concerns about our privacy policies, please contact us through our contact form.

termsAndConditions.title: Terms and Conditions
termsAndConditions.description: Welcome to our platform. Please read these terms and conditions carefully before using our services. By accessing or using this website, you agree to the terms described below.

purpose.title: 1. Purpose of the Platform
purpose.content: This website is designed for educational and health purposes. All information provided should be used responsibly and does not replace professional medical advice.

acceptableUse.title: 2. Acceptable Use
content: Use the information for educational and non-commercial purposes.
Do not share, distribute, or modify content without prior authorization.
Respect applicable laws and avoid malicious activities.

liabilityLimitation.title: 3. Limitation of Liability
liabilityLimitation.content: The information provided on this site is offered 'as is' and does not guarantee its accuracy, completeness, or relevance for all circumstances.

modifications.title: 4. Modifications to the Terms
modifications.content: We reserve the right to update these terms and conditions at any time. We recommend reviewing this page periodically to stay informed of changes.

contact.title: 5. Contact
contact.content: If you have questions or concerns about these terms, contact us through the contact form on our main page.
